html:
11 Oct 2024

Fresh Young Adult Novels to Fly Away With

Ready to escape into new worlds? Our selection of fresh young adult novels offers thrilling adventures, unforgettable characters, and captivating stories that will take you on an unforgettable journey. Whether you’re in the mood for fantasy, romance, or heartfelt coming-of-age tales, these books promise to spark your imagination and keep you turning pages late into the night.

Kianola

by Nathan Roth

Release Date: September 16 2024

Can a hero in-game become a hero in real life? Middle school challenges collide with the freedom of an online fantasy world. Nole, a shy eighth grader, escapes into Enix, reinventing himself. As he faces bullies, crushes, and self-doubt, he finds solace in a realm where he can be anyone, growing up in both reality and the virtual world.

Buy on Amazon

A Star of Darkness (The Scented Court Book 5)

by A.L. Knorr

Release Date: September 30 2024

Vesper must decide if she can trust Regalis with the truth she’s buried deep, while Regalis faces the ultimate test—can he forgive the web of lies spun in fear? As past sins collide with present dangers, one question remains: who will make the ultimate sacrifice?

Buy on Amazon

The Discovery of Magic (The Intrigue of Magic Book One)

by L. J. Evias

Release Date: September 26 2024

Transported to an ancient realm of magic and mystery, can a young woman survive scheming royals, shifting alliances, and impending war?

Buy on Amazon

Illusions of a Timeline (The Starbinds Series, Book 3)

by Angela K. French

Release Date: September 28 2024

Abby must return to Earth to retrieve her father’s manual, which contains the key to his psychomanteum. There, she hopes to find guidance from her father’s ghost. But obstacles stand in her way, and time is running out. Will she be able to save Bryson and set her life back on track before it’s too late?

Buy on Amazon

Once Upon A Realm (Once Upon A Legend Book 3)

by Mary Ting

Release Date: September 20 2024

No amount of preparation, weaponry, or dragons will ensure their win unless Idrisa and Caliburn seal the rip in their sky, the very essences where dark magic began. As more secrets are revealed, loyalties are tested, and one way or another, an ending is on its way. Idrisa must give everything to save her world.

Buy on Amazon

The Tenth Rider (The Dragon Oath Trilogy Book 1)

by L.K. Lazarus

Release Date: September 21 2024

In a world where the ancient bond between dragons and their riders has long been broken, Rook Valen, a young man from the quiet village of Greystone, stumbles upon a discovery that will forever change his fate. An unexpected encounter with a dragon’s egg pulls him into a forgotten prophecy, revealing that his family holds a key to the long-lost Council of Riders.

Buy on Amazon
